name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Impulse. Focus Control and Screen Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block URLs to improve your focus and productivity with Screen Time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to help you stay focused and boost your productivity 🙌

Why Choose Us?
✅ It's FREE
✅ Easy to set up and use

🆕 New Features in the latest version (1.7.2):
🟡 Password Protection: Activate password protection to secure your focus settings.
🟡 Protect Your Settings with Email Confirmation: A unique code will be sent to your email to authorize any changes made to your settings.



🛠️ Key Features:
🟡 Quick Focus: Instantly block configured URLs to maximize productivity.
🟡 Period URL Blocking: Schedule specific times to block distracting websites, ensuring focus during critical periods.
🟡 Screen Time Analytics: Track and analyze your screen time for better insights.
🟡 Limit of Opens per URL: Set a daily limit on how many times you can open a URL.
🟡 Limit of Time per URL: Restrict the amount of time you can spend on specific websites.
🟡 Impulse Control: Set a timer to lock yourself out of distracting sites when you need it most.
🟡 Automatic Tab Refresh: Ensures all open tabs are refreshed to immediately apply restrictions.
🟡 Stop Scrolling: Limit endless scrolling on certain URLs to avoid wasting time.
🟡 Continuous Usage Warning: Receive alerts if you spend too much time on a website.

💡 How to Use Impulse?

Install: Add the Impulse extension to your browser.
Customize: Configure your settings by adding websites and setting your blocking periods.
Activate: Enable Impulse and stay focused!
